column6:
"MOTHER RUSSIA" PART 2 (OF 6),2004,11
Nicky Fury's got a job that needs doing - in Russia. The kind of suicide mission any sane man wouldn't ponder for a second. And that's exactly why he needs Frank Castle.
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | penciller:Doug Braithwaite | writer:Garth Ennis | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Bill Reinhold | colorist:Raul Trevino
